description: From a data producer account, authorizes the sharing of a datashare with one or more consumer accounts or managing entities. To authorize a datashare for a data consumer, the producer account must have the correct access permissions.

parameters.name: DataShareArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the datashare namespace that producers are to authorize sharing for.

parameters.name: ConsumerIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the data consumer that is authorized to access the datashare. This identifier is an Amazon Web Services account ID or a keyword, such as ADX.

nested_items.name: DataShareArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the datashare that the consumer is to use.

nested_items.name: ProducerArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the producer namespace.

nested_items.name: AllowPubliclyAccessibleConsumers
nested_items.description: A value that specifies whether the datashare can be shared to a publicly accessible cluster.

nested_items.name: DataShareAssociations
nested_items.description: A value that specifies when the datashare has an association between producer and data consumers.

nested_items.name: ConsumerIdentifier
nested_items.description: The name of the consumer accounts that have an association with a producer datashare.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the datashare that is associated.

nested_items.name: ConsumerRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the consumer accounts that have an association with a producer datashare.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The creation date of the datashare that is associated.

nested_items.name: StatusChangeDate
nested_items.description: The status change data of the datashare that is associated.

nested_items.name: ProducerAllowedWrites
nested_items.description: Specifies whether write operations were allowed during data share authorization.

nested_items.name: ConsumerAcceptedWrites
nested_items.description: Specifies whether write operations were allowed during data share association.

nested_items.name: ManagedBy
nested_items.description: The identifier of a datashare to show its managing entity.

nested_items.name: DataShareType
nested_items.description: The type of the datashare created by RegisterNamespace.
